searchengine.spider
Interface SpiderInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
BreadthFirstSpider, PriorityBasedSpider
public interface SpiderInterface

An interface for web-crawling objects.

Method Summary
 Indexer crawl()
          Crawl the web, up to the default number of web pages.
 Indexer crawl(int limit)
          Crawl the web, up to a certain number of web pages.
 

Method Detail

crawl

Indexer crawl(int limit)
Crawl the web, up to a certain number of web pages.

Parameters:
limit - The maximum number of pages to crawl.
Returns:
The web index resulting from this crawl (and any previous ones).

crawl

Indexer crawl()
Crawl the web, up to the default number of web pages.

Returns:
The web index resulting from this crawl.
